name: ZigZag!
description:
In this arcade-style dodge and weaving minigame, try your best to make your way through, and get a new high-score!

CONTROLS:

You can use any of the three control schemes below...

- WASD

- Arrow Keys

- Controller Joystick

HIGH SCORES:

Share your high score down in the comments, along with the version of the game you were playing (Windows or Web)
